title: Discovery Candidates
description: TV dramas discovered but not yet fully evaluated and added to the pool

candidates.title: True Blood
candidates.reason: Major HBO drama, vampire genre, 7 seasons, significant cultural impact
candidates.notes: Scored via subagent. Strong world-building (8.0) and drive (8.5), penalized for finale (resol 5.5).

candidates.title: Sons of Anarchy
candidates.reason: Major FX drama, crime genre, 7 seasons, strong following
candidates.notes: Scored via subagent. Strong characters (8.5) and world-building (8.5). 'Hamlet on Harleys' with real Hell's Angels advisors.

candidates.title: The Vampire Diaries
candidates.reason: Popular CW drama, 8 seasons, supernatural genre
candidates.notes: Scored. Peak seasons 1-3 strong (drive 8.0), later seasons declined. 171 episodes total.

candidates.title: Yellowstone
candidates.reason: Major contemporary drama, Western genre, huge viewership
candidates.notes: Scored. Costner's performance, authentic world-building (8.5). Taylor Sheridan's signature series.

candidates.title: Yellowjackets
candidates.notes: Scored. Dual timeline survival horror. Strong conceptual density (8.0). Season 3 just concluded.

candidates.title: The Bear
candidates.reason: Already in index but may need quality review

candidates.title: Industry
candidates.notes: Scored during heartbeat. Authentic finance world, strong world-building (7.5). TMDB: 6.78.

candidates.title: Severance
candidates.reason: Already in top 100, check writeup quality
